headline: Coterra Energy Announces Pricing of $1.5 Billion of Senior Unsecured Notes
summary: HOUSTON, December 03, 2024--Coterra Energy Inc. ("Coterra") (NYSE: CTRA) announced today that it has priced an offering of $750 million aggregate principal amount of senior unsecured notes due 2035, which will carry an interest rate of 5.40% (the "2035 notes"), and $750 million aggregate principal amount of senior unsecured notes due 2055, which will carry an interest rate of 5.90% (the "2055 notes" and, together with the 2035 notes, the "notes"). The offering is expected to close on December 17
